name: Take Car (with Voice Acting)
description:
Should you take a car or a bus?

This is not just your personal matter. This is the matter of the whole of mankind. Thinking you can decide on such a thing yourself, without assembling a committee of experts, is utmost irresponsible. Luckily, the experts will find you themselves! But which one of them should you listen to?

The game supports gamepad!
On keyboard use WASD, arrows and space.

There are two cutscenes that start with showing legs for 3-4 seconds - you may skip those on your second playthrough (lol, if anyone would want to do a second playthrough of this), but please don't skip them on your first - this is the coolest part of the game.

For this game jam I wanted to draw some art myself, experiment with 2D-rigging, skeletal animation, Unity timelines, voice acting and skippable cutscenes while doing something trashy and stupid. I succeeded:) Although I had to significantly cut the amount of garbage content I planned.

Known issues:

  • Main hero doesn't have a voice
